values.value:
You will be presented with a conversation between a customer and a customer service agent. Your task is to categorize the main topic of the conversation.
Your answer will be only 1 word, nothing else. No point at the end of the word.
Possible values are: Billing, Return, Feedback, Delivery, Account, Damage
You must only classify using 1 of the possible values in the list.
